allOf.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

allOf.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

EnumImageBackendsLive.description: enum to choose image backend LIVE from
EnumImageBackendsLive.title: EnumImageBackendsLive

EnumImageBackendsMain.description: enum to choose image backend MAIN from
EnumImageBackendsMain.title: EnumImageBackendsMain

EnumPicamStreamQuality.description:
Enum type to describe the quality wanted from an encoder.
This may be passed if a specific value (such as bitrate) has not been set.
EnumPicamStreamQuality.title: EnumPicamStreamQuality

EnumPilgramFilter.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
EnumPilgramFilter.title: EnumPilgramFilter

GroupBackends.description:
Choose backends for still images/high quality images captured on main backend.
If the livepreview is enabled, the video is captured from live backend (if configured)
or main backend.

allOf.description: enum to choose image backend MAIN from
allOf.title: EnumImageBackendsMain

MAIN_BACKEND.description: Main backend to use for high quality still captures. Also used for livepreview if backend is capable of.
MAIN_BACKEND.title: Main Backend

allOf.description: enum to choose image backend LIVE from
allOf.title: EnumImageBackendsLive

LIVE_BACKEND.description: Secondary backend used for live streaming only. Useful to stream from webcam if DSLR camera has no livestream capability.
LIVE_BACKEND.title: Live Backend

LIVEPREVIEW_FRAMERATE.description: Reduce the framerate to save cpu/gpu on device displaying the live preview
LIVEPREVIEW_FRAMERATE.title: Livepreview Framerate

retry_capture.description: Number of attempts to gather a picture from backend.
retry_capture.title: Retry Capture

gphoto2_capture_target.description: Set capture target (examples: 'Internal RAM', 'Memory card'). To keep images, capture to a disk target. Empty means default of camera (mostly RAM).
gphoto2_capture_target.title: Gphoto2 Capture Target

gphoto2_disable_viewfinder_before_captur.description: Disable viewfinder before capture might speed up following capture autofocus. Might not work with every camera.
gphoto2_disable_viewfinder_before_captur.title: Gphoto2 Disable Viewfinder Before Capture

gphoto2_iso_liveview.description: Sets the ISO for when the photobooth is in live preview modus. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. Only works when the camera is in manual. (Example Values: Auto, 100, 200, ...)
gphoto2_iso_liveview.title: Gphoto2 Iso Liveview

gphoto2_iso_capture.description: Sets the ISO for when the photobooth captures a photo. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. Only works when the camera is in manual. (Example Values: Auto, 100, 200, ...)
gphoto2_iso_capture.title: Gphoto2 Iso Capture

gphoto2_shutter_speed_liveview.description: Sets the shutter speed for the camera during the photobooth's live preview mode. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. This setting is effective only when the camera is in manual mode. (Example Values: 1, 1/5, 1/20, 1/30, 1/60, 1/1000, 1/4000, ...) Choose a very high default shutter speed in combination with Auto iso to emulate auto exposure.
gphoto2_shutter_speed_liveview.title: Gphoto2 Shutter Speed Liveview

gphoto2_shutter_speed_capture.description: Configures the shutter speed for the camera at the time of capturing a photo in the photobooth. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. Operational only in manual mode. (Example Values: 1/60, 1/320, 1/1000, 1/2000, 1/4000, ...)
gphoto2_shutter_speed_capture.title: Gphoto2 Shutter Speed Capture

cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: still photo camera resolution width to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Cv2 Cam Resolution Width

cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: still photo camera resolution height to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Cv2 Cam Resolution Height

cv2_device_index.description: Device index of webcam opened in cv2 backend
cv2_device_index.title: Cv2 Device Index

cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.description: Apply horizontal flip to image source to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.title: Cv2 Camera Transform Hflip

cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.description: Apply vertical flip to image source to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.title: Cv2 Camera Transform Vflip

v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: still photo camera resolution width on supported backends
v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: V4L Cam Resolution Width

v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: still photo camera resolution height on supported backends
v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: V4L Cam Resolution Height

v4l_device_index.description: Device index of webcam opened in v4l backend
v4l_device_index.title: V4L Device Index

digicamcontrol_base_url.description: Base URL used to connect to the host running the digicamcontrol software. Usually photobooth-app and digicamcontrol are on the same computer and no adjustmend needed.
digicamcontrol_base_url.title: Digicamcontrol Base Url

picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: camera resolution width to capture high resolution photo
picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Picamera2 Capture Cam Resolution Width

picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: camera resolution height to capture high resolution photo
picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Picamera2 Capture Cam Resolution Height

picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: camera resolution width to capture live video
picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Picamera2 Preview Cam Resolution Width

picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: camera resolution height to capture live video
picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Picamera2 Preview Cam Resolution Height

picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: actual resolution width for liveview stream
picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Picamera2 Liveview Resolution Width

picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: actual resolution height for liveview stream
picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Picamera2 Liveview Resolution Height

picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.description: Apply horizontal flip to image source to picamera2 backend
picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.title: Picamera2 Camera Transform Hflip

picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.description: Apply vertical flip to image source to picamera2 backend
picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.title: Picamera2 Camera Transform Vflip

picamera2_AE_EXPOSURE_MODE.description: Usually 0=normal exposure, 1=short, 2=long, 3=custom. Not all necessarily supported by camera!
picamera2_AE_EXPOSURE_MODE.title: Picamera2 Ae Exposure Mode

allOf.description:
Enum type to describe the quality wanted from an encoder.
This may be passed if a specific value (such as bitrate) has not been set.
allOf.title: EnumPicamStreamQuality

picamera2_stream_quality.description: Lower quality results in less data to be transferred and may reduce load on display device.
picamera2_stream_quality.title: Picamera2 Stream Quality (for livepreview)

GroupBackends.title: Camera Backend Config

GroupCollageProcess.description: Configure stages how to process collage after capture.

other_general_settings.description: Height (Y) in pixel of animation image (GIF). The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
other_general_settings.title: Other General Settings

collage_pipeline_sets.description: yes, this is another level, maybe expandable?

items.description: Configure stages how to process collage after capture.

capture_fill_background_enable.description: Apply solid color background to captured image (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
capture_fill_background_enable.title: Capture Fill Background Enable

capture_fill_background_color.description: Solid color used to fill background.
capture_fill_background_color.title: Capture Fill Background Color

capture_img_background_enable.description: Add image from file to background (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
capture_img_background_enable.title: Capture Img Background Enable

capture_img_background_file.description: Image file to use as background filling transparent area. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
capture_img_background_file.title: Capture Img Background File

canvas_width.description: Width (X) in pixel of collage image. The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_width.title: Canvas Width

canvas_height.description: Height (Y) in pixel of collage image. The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_height.title: Canvas Height

canvas_merge_definition.description: How to arrange single images in the collage. Pos_x/Pos_y measure in pixel starting 0/0 at top-left in image. Width/Height in pixels. Aspect ratio is kept always. Predefined image files are used instead a camera capture. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*

allOf.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

canvas_merge_definition.title: Canvas Merge Definition

canvas_fill_background_enable.description: Apply solid color background to collage
canvas_fill_background_enable.title: Canvas Fill Background Enable

canvas_fill_background_color.description: Solid color used to fill background.
canvas_fill_background_color.title: Canvas Fill Background Color

canvas_img_background_enable.description: Add image from file to background.
canvas_img_background_enable.title: Canvas Img Background Enable

canvas_img_background_file.description: Image file to use as background filling transparent area. File needs to be located in userdata/*
canvas_img_background_file.title: Canvas Img Background File

canvas_img_front_file.description: Image file to paste on top over photos and backgrounds. Photos are visible only through transparant parts. Image needs to be transparent (PNG). File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
canvas_img_front_file.title: Canvas Img Front File

canvas_texts.description: Text to overlay on final collage. Pos_x/Pos_y measure in pixel starting 0/0 at top-left in image. Font to use in text stages. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
canvas_texts.title: Canvas Texts

items.title: Process collage after capture

collage_pipeline_sets.title: Collage Pipeline Sets

GroupCollageProcess.title: New Test!

countdown_capture_first.description: Countdown in seconds, started when user start a capture process
countdown_capture_first.title: Countdown Capture First

countdown_capture_second_following.description: Countdown in seconds, used for second and following captures for collages
countdown_capture_second_following.title: Countdown Capture Second Following

countdown_camera_capture_offset.description: Trigger camera capture by offset earlier (in seconds). 0 trigger exactly when countdown is 0. Use to compensate for delay in camera processing for better UX.
countdown_camera_capture_offset.title: Countdown Camera Capture Offset

collage_automatic_capture_continue.description: Automatically continue with second and following images to capture for collage. No user interaction in between.
collage_automatic_capture_continue.title: Collage Automatic Capture Continue

collage_approve_autoconfirm_timeout.description: If user is required to approve collage captures, after this timeout, the job continues and user confirmation is assumed.
collage_approve_autoconfirm_timeout.title: Collage Approve Autoconfirm Timeout

gallery_show_individual_images.description: Show individual images of collages/animations in the gallery. Hidden images are still stored in the data folder. (Note: changing this setting will not change visibility of already captured images).
gallery_show_individual_images.title: Gallery Show Individual Images

allOf.description: enum for debuglevel
allOf.title: EnumDebugLevel

DEBUG_LEVEL.description: Log verbosity. File is writte to disc, and latest log is displayed also in UI.
DEBUG_LEVEL.title: Debug Level

webserver_bind_ip.description: IP/Hostname to bind the webserver to. 0.0.0.0 means bind to all IP adresses of host.
webserver_bind_ip.title: Webserver Bind Ip

webserver_port.description: Port to serve the photobooth website. Ensure the port is available. Ports below 1024 need root!
webserver_port.title: Webserver Port

GroupFileTransfer.description: Configuration for USB File Transfer Service.

enabled.description: Enable the automatic file transfer to USB service. Files are copied when the USB drive is inserted.
enabled.title: Enabled

target_folder_name.description: Name of the top-level folder on the USB drive where files will be copied to.
target_folder_name.title: Target Folder Name

GroupFileTransfer.title: USB File Transfer Service Config

GroupHardwareInputOutput.description: Configure hardware GPIO, keyboard and more. Find integration information in the documentation.

keyboard_input_keycode_takepic.description: Keycode triggers capture of one image
keyboard_input_keycode_takepic.title: Keyboard Input Keycode Takepic

keyboard_input_keycode_takevideo.description: Keycode triggers start and stop of video (MP4)
keyboard_input_keycode_takevideo.title: Keyboard Input Keycode Takevideo

keyboard_input_keycode_print_recent_item.description: Keycode triggers printing most recent image captured
keyboard_input_keycode_print_recent_item.title: Keyboard Input Keycode Print Recent Item

wled_enabled.description: Enable WLED integration for user feedback during countdown and capture by LEDs.
wled_enabled.title: Wled Enabled

wled_serial_port.description: Serial port the WLED device is connected to.
wled_serial_port.title: Wled Serial Port

gpio_pin_shutdown.description: GPIO pin to shutdown after holding it for 2 seconds.
gpio_pin_shutdown.title: Gpio Pin Shutdown

gpio_pin_reboot.description: GPIO pin to reboot after holding it for 2 seconds.
gpio_pin_reboot.title: Gpio Pin Reboot

gpio_pin_take1pic.description: GPIO pin to take one picture.
gpio_pin_take1pic.title: Gpio Pin Take1Pic

gpio_pin_collage.description: GPIO pin to take a collage.
gpio_pin_collage.title: Gpio Pin Collage

gpio_pin_animation.description: GPIO pin to take an animation (GIF).
gpio_pin_animation.title: Gpio Pin Animation

gpio_pin_video.description: GPIO pin to start recording / stop recording a video (MP4).
gpio_pin_video.title: Gpio Pin Video

gpio_pin_print_recent_item.description: GPIO pin to print last captured item.
gpio_pin_print_recent_item.title: Gpio Pin Print Recent Item

printing_command.description: Command issued to print. Use {filename} as placeholder for the JPEG image to be printed.
printing_command.title: Printing Command

printing_blocked_time.description: Block queue print until time is passed. Time in seconds.
printing_blocked_time.title: Printing Blocked Time

GroupHardwareInputOutput.title: Hardware Input/Output Config

GroupMediaprocessing.description: Configure stages how to process images after capture.

HIRES_STILL_QUALITY.description: Still JPEG full resolution quality, applied to download images and images with filter
HIRES_STILL_QUALITY.title: Hires Still Quality

LIVEPREVIEW_QUALITY.description: Livepreview stream JPEG image quality on supported backends
LIVEPREVIEW_QUALITY.title: Livepreview Quality

THUMBNAIL_STILL_QUALITY.description: Still JPEG thumbnail quality, thumbs used in gallery list
THUMBNAIL_STILL_QUALITY.title: Thumbnail Still Quality

PREVIEW_STILL_QUALITY.description: Still JPEG preview quality, preview still shown in gallery detail
PREVIEW_STILL_QUALITY.title: Preview Still Quality

FULL_STILL_WIDTH.description: Width of resized full image with filters applied. For performance choose as low as possible but still gives decent print quality. Example: 1500/6inch=250dpi
FULL_STILL_WIDTH.title: Full Still Width

PREVIEW_STILL_WIDTH.description: Width of resized preview image, height is automatically calculated to keep aspect ratio
PREVIEW_STILL_WIDTH.title: Preview Still Width

THUMBNAIL_STILL_WIDTH.description: Width of resized thumbnail image, height is automatically calculated to keep aspect ratio
THUMBNAIL_STILL_WIDTH.title: Thumbnail Still Width

removechromakey_enable.description: Apply chromakey greenscreen removal from captured images
removechromakey_enable.title: Removechromakey Enable

removechromakey_keycolor.description: Color (H) in HSV colorspace to remove on 360° scale.
removechromakey_keycolor.title: Removechromakey Keycolor

removechromakey_tolerance.description: Tolerance for color (H) on chromakey color removal.
removechromakey_tolerance.title: Removechromakey Tolerance

GroupMediaprocessing.title: Process media after capture

GroupMediaprocessingPipelineAnimation.description: Configure stages how to process collage after capture.

canvas_width.description: Width (X) in pixel of animation image (GIF). The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_width.title: Canvas Width

canvas_height.description: Height (Y) in pixel of animation image (GIF). The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_height.title: Canvas Height

sequence_merge_definition.description: Sequence images in an animated GIF. Predefined image files are used instead a camera capture. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*

allOf.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

sequence_merge_definition.title: Sequence Merge Definition

GroupMediaprocessingPipelineAnimation.title: Process Animation (GIF) after capture

GroupMediaprocessingPipelinePrint.description: Configure stages how to process mediaitem before printing on paper.
GroupMediaprocessingPipelinePrint.title: Process mediaitem before printing on paper

GroupMediaprocessingPipelineSingleImage.description: Configure stages how to process images after capture.

allOf.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

filter.description: Instagram-like filter to apply per default. 'original' applies no filter.
filter.title: Pic1 Filter

fill_background_enable.description: Apply solid color background to captured image (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
fill_background_enable.title: Fill Background Enable

fill_background_color.description: Solid color used to fill background.
fill_background_color.title: Fill Background Color

img_background_enable.description: Add image from file to background (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
img_background_enable.title: Img Background Enable

img_background_file.description: Image file to use as background filling transparent area. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
img_background_file.title: Img Background File

img_frame_file.description: Image file to which the captured image is mounted to. Frame determines the output image size! Photos are visible through transparant parts. Image needs to be transparent (PNG). File needs to be located in userdata/*
img_frame_file.title: Img Frame File

texts.description: Text to overlay on images after capture. Pos_x/Pos_y measure in pixel starting 0/0 at top-left in image. Font to use in text stages. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
texts.title: Texts

GroupMediaprocessingPipelineSingleImage.title: Postprocess single captures

GroupMisc.description: Quite advanced or experimental, usually not necessary to touch. Can change any time.

video_duration.description: Duration of a video in seconds. The user can stop recording earlier but cannot take longer videos.
video_duration.title: Video Duration

GroupMisc.title: Miscellaneous Config

shareservice_enabled.description: Enable share service. To enable URL needs to be configured and dl.php script setup properly.
shareservice_enabled.title: Shareservice Enabled

shareservice_url.description: URL of php script that is used to serve files and share via QR code. The default is a landingpage with further instructions how to setup.
shareservice_url.title: Shareservice Url

shareservice_apikey.description: Key to secure the download php script. Set the key in dl.php script to same value. Only if correct key is provided the shareservice works properly.
shareservice_apikey.title: Shareservice Apikey

shareservice_share_original.description: Upload original image as received from camera. If unchecked, the full processed version is uploaded with filter and texts applied.
shareservice_share_original.title: Shareservice Share Original

share_custom_qr_url.description: URL displayed as QR code to image for download. Need you to sync the files on your own or allow the user to access via hotspot. {filename} is replaced by actual filename in QR code.
share_custom_qr_url.title: Share Custom Qr Url

show_takepic_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture single picture on frontpage.
show_takepic_on_frontpage.title: Show Takepic On Frontpage

show_takecollage_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture collage on frontpage.
show_takecollage_on_frontpage.title: Show Takecollage On Frontpage

show_takeanimation_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture animated GIF on frontpage.
show_takeanimation_on_frontpage.title: Show Takeanimation On Frontpage

show_takevideo_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture video on frontpage.
show_takevideo_on_frontpage.title: Show Takevideo On Frontpage

show_gallery_on_frontpage.description: Show button to gallery on frontpage.
show_gallery_on_frontpage.title: Show Gallery On Frontpage

show_admin_on_frontpage.description: Show button to admin center, usually only during setup.
show_admin_on_frontpage.title: Show Admin On Frontpage

show_automatic_slideshow_timeout.description: Timeout (seconds) after which a random order slideshow of all images is started. Set to 0 to disable.
show_automatic_slideshow_timeout.title: Show Automatic Slideshow Timeout

livestream_mirror_effect.description: Flip livestream horizontally to create a mirror effect feeling more natural to users.
livestream_mirror_effect.title: Livestream Mirror Effect

FRONTPAGE_TEXT.default:
Hey!
Let's take some pictures!
📷💕
FRONTPAGE_TEXT.title: Frontpage Text

TAKEPIC_MSG_TIME.description: Offset in seconds, the smile-icon shall be shown.
TAKEPIC_MSG_TIME.title: Takepic Msg Time

TAKEPIC_MSG_TEXT.description: Message to display at the end of the capture countdown.
TAKEPIC_MSG_TEXT.title: Takepic Msg Text

AUTOCLOSE_NEW_ITEM_ARRIVED.description: Timeout in seconds a new item popup closes automatically.
AUTOCLOSE_NEW_ITEM_ARRIVED.title: Autoclose New Item Arrived

GALLERY_EMPTY_MSG.default:
Empty, Zero, Nada! 🤷‍♂️
Let's take some pictures!
📷💕
GALLERY_EMPTY_MSG.description: Message displayed if gallery is empty.
GALLERY_EMPTY_MSG.title: Gallery Empty Msg

gallery_show_qrcode.description: Show QR code in gallery. If shareservice is enabled the URL is automatically generated, if not go to share config and provide URL.
gallery_show_qrcode.title: Gallery Show Qrcode

gallery_filter_userselectable.description: Filter the user may choose from in the gallery. 'original' applies no filter.

items.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
items.title: EnumPilgramFilter

gallery_filter_userselectable.title: Pic1 Filter Userselectable

gallery_show_delete.description: Show delete button for items in gallery.
gallery_show_delete.title: Gallery Show Delete

gallery_show_print.description: Show print button for items in gallery.
gallery_show_print.title: Gallery Show Print

description:
AppConfig class glueing all together

In the case where a value is specified for the same Settings field in multiple ways, the selected value is determined as follows
(in descending order of priority):

1 Arguments passed to the Settings class initialiser.
2 Environment variables, e.g. my_prefix_special_function as described above.
3 Variables loaded from a dotenv (.env) file.
4 Variables loaded from the secrets directory.
5 The default field values for the Settings model.

allOf.description: Common config for photobooth.

gallery_filter_userselectable12.description: Filter the user may choose from in the gallery. 'original' applies no filter.

items.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
items.title: EnumPilgramFilter

gallery_filter_userselectable12.title: Pic1 Filter Userselectable

countdown_capture_first.description: Countdown in seconds, started when user start a capture process
countdown_capture_first.title: Countdown Capture First

countdown_capture_second_following.description: Countdown in seconds, used for second and following captures for collages
countdown_capture_second_following.title: Countdown Capture Second Following

countdown_camera_capture_offset.description: Trigger camera capture by offset earlier (in seconds). 0 trigger exactly when countdown is 0. Use to compensate for delay in camera processing for better UX.
countdown_camera_capture_offset.title: Countdown Camera Capture Offset

collage_automatic_capture_continue.description: Automatically continue with second and following images to capture for collage. No user interaction in between.
collage_automatic_capture_continue.title: Collage Automatic Capture Continue

collage_approve_autoconfirm_timeout.description: If user is required to approve collage captures, after this timeout, the job continues and user confirmation is assumed.
collage_approve_autoconfirm_timeout.title: Collage Approve Autoconfirm Timeout

gallery_show_individual_images.description: Show individual images of collages/animations in the gallery. Hidden images are still stored in the data folder. (Note: changing this setting will not change visibility of already captured images).
gallery_show_individual_images.title: Gallery Show Individual Images

allOf.description: enum for debuglevel
allOf.title: EnumDebugLevel

DEBUG_LEVEL.description: Log verbosity. File is writte to disc, and latest log is displayed also in UI.
DEBUG_LEVEL.title: Debug Level

webserver_bind_ip.description: IP/Hostname to bind the webserver to. 0.0.0.0 means bind to all IP adresses of host.
webserver_bind_ip.title: Webserver Bind Ip

webserver_port.description: Port to serve the photobooth website. Ensure the port is available. Ports below 1024 need root!
webserver_port.title: Webserver Port

allOf.title: Common Config

allOf.description: Settings about shareing media

shareservice_enabled.description: Enable share service. To enable URL needs to be configured and dl.php script setup properly.
shareservice_enabled.title: Shareservice Enabled

shareservice_url.description: URL of php script that is used to serve files and share via QR code. The default is a landingpage with further instructions how to setup.
shareservice_url.title: Shareservice Url

shareservice_apikey.description: Key to secure the download php script. Set the key in dl.php script to same value. Only if correct key is provided the shareservice works properly.
shareservice_apikey.title: Shareservice Apikey

shareservice_share_original.description: Upload original image as received from camera. If unchecked, the full processed version is uploaded with filter and texts applied.
shareservice_share_original.title: Shareservice Share Original

share_custom_qr_url.description: URL displayed as QR code to image for download. Need you to sync the files on your own or allow the user to access via hotspot. {filename} is replaced by actual filename in QR code.
share_custom_qr_url.title: Share Custom Qr Url

allOf.title: 🫶 Share Config

allOf.description: Configuration for USB File Transfer Service.

enabled.description: Enable the automatic file transfer to USB service. Files are copied when the USB drive is inserted.
enabled.title: Enabled

target_folder_name.description: Name of the top-level folder on the USB drive where files will be copied to.
target_folder_name.title: Target Folder Name

allOf.title: USB File Transfer Service Config

allOf.description: Configure stages how to process images after capture.

HIRES_STILL_QUALITY.description: Still JPEG full resolution quality, applied to download images and images with filter
HIRES_STILL_QUALITY.title: Hires Still Quality

LIVEPREVIEW_QUALITY.description: Livepreview stream JPEG image quality on supported backends
LIVEPREVIEW_QUALITY.title: Livepreview Quality

THUMBNAIL_STILL_QUALITY.description: Still JPEG thumbnail quality, thumbs used in gallery list
THUMBNAIL_STILL_QUALITY.title: Thumbnail Still Quality

PREVIEW_STILL_QUALITY.description: Still JPEG preview quality, preview still shown in gallery detail
PREVIEW_STILL_QUALITY.title: Preview Still Quality

FULL_STILL_WIDTH.description: Width of resized full image with filters applied. For performance choose as low as possible but still gives decent print quality. Example: 1500/6inch=250dpi
FULL_STILL_WIDTH.title: Full Still Width

PREVIEW_STILL_WIDTH.description: Width of resized preview image, height is automatically calculated to keep aspect ratio
PREVIEW_STILL_WIDTH.title: Preview Still Width

THUMBNAIL_STILL_WIDTH.description: Width of resized thumbnail image, height is automatically calculated to keep aspect ratio
THUMBNAIL_STILL_WIDTH.title: Thumbnail Still Width

removechromakey_enable.description: Apply chromakey greenscreen removal from captured images
removechromakey_enable.title: Removechromakey Enable

removechromakey_keycolor.description: Color (H) in HSV colorspace to remove on 360° scale.
removechromakey_keycolor.title: Removechromakey Keycolor

removechromakey_tolerance.description: Tolerance for color (H) on chromakey color removal.
removechromakey_tolerance.title: Removechromakey Tolerance

allOf.title: Process media after capture

allOf.description: Configure stages how to process images after capture.
enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

filter.description: Instagram-like filter to apply per default. 'original' applies no filter.
filter.title: Pic1 Filter

fill_background_enable.description: Apply solid color background to captured image (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
fill_background_enable.title: Fill Background Enable

fill_background_color.description: Solid color used to fill background.
fill_background_color.title: Fill Background Color

img_background_enable.description: Add image from file to background (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
img_background_enable.title: Img Background Enable

img_background_file.description: Image file to use as background filling transparent area. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
img_background_file.title: Img Background File

img_frame_file.description: Image file to which the captured image is mounted to. Frame determines the output image size! Photos are visible through transparant parts. Image needs to be transparent (PNG). File needs to be located in userdata/*
img_frame_file.title: Img Frame File

texts.description: Text to overlay on images after capture. Pos_x/Pos_y measure in pixel starting 0/0 at top-left in image. Font to use in text stages. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
texts.title: Texts

allOf.title: Postprocess single captures

allOf.description: Configure stages how to process collage after capture.

capture_fill_background_enable.description: Apply solid color background to captured image (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
capture_fill_background_enable.title: Capture Fill Background Enable

capture_fill_background_color.description: Solid color used to fill background.
capture_fill_background_color.title: Capture Fill Background Color

capture_img_background_enable.description: Add image from file to background (useful only if image is extended or background removed)
capture_img_background_enable.title: Capture Img Background Enable

capture_img_background_file.description: Image file to use as background filling transparent area. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
capture_img_background_file.title: Capture Img Background File

canvas_width.description: Width (X) in pixel of collage image. The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_width.title: Canvas Width

canvas_height.description: Height (Y) in pixel of collage image. The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_height.title: Canvas Height

canvas_merge_definition.description: How to arrange single images in the collage. Pos_x/Pos_y measure in pixel starting 0/0 at top-left in image. Width/Height in pixels. Aspect ratio is kept always. Predefined image files are used instead a camera capture. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*

allOf.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

canvas_merge_definition.title: Canvas Merge Definition

canvas_fill_background_enable.description: Apply solid color background to collage
canvas_fill_background_enable.title: Canvas Fill Background Enable

canvas_fill_background_color.description: Solid color used to fill background.
canvas_fill_background_color.title: Canvas Fill Background Color

canvas_img_background_enable.description: Add image from file to background.
canvas_img_background_enable.title: Canvas Img Background Enable

canvas_img_background_file.description: Image file to use as background filling transparent area. File needs to be located in userdata/*
canvas_img_background_file.title: Canvas Img Background File

canvas_img_front_file.description: Image file to paste on top over photos and backgrounds. Photos are visible only through transparant parts. Image needs to be transparent (PNG). File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
canvas_img_front_file.title: Canvas Img Front File

canvas_texts.description: Text to overlay on final collage. Pos_x/Pos_y measure in pixel starting 0/0 at top-left in image. Font to use in text stages. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*
canvas_texts.title: Canvas Texts

allOf.title: Process collage after capture

allOf.description: Configure stages how to process collage after capture.

canvas_width.description: Width (X) in pixel of animation image (GIF). The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_width.title: Canvas Width

canvas_height.description: Height (Y) in pixel of animation image (GIF). The higher the better the quality but also longer time to process. All processes keep aspect ratio.
canvas_height.title: Canvas Height

sequence_merge_definition.description: Sequence images in an animated GIF. Predefined image files are used instead a camera capture. File needs to be located in DATA_DIR/*

allOf.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
allOf.title: EnumPilgramFilter

sequence_merge_definition.title: Sequence Merge Definition

allOf.title: Process Animation (GIF) after capture

allOf.description: Configure stages how to process mediaitem before printing on paper.
allOf.title: Process mediaitem before printing on paper

allOf.description: Personalize the booth's UI.

show_takepic_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture single picture on frontpage.
show_takepic_on_frontpage.title: Show Takepic On Frontpage

show_takecollage_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture collage on frontpage.
show_takecollage_on_frontpage.title: Show Takecollage On Frontpage

show_takeanimation_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture animated GIF on frontpage.
show_takeanimation_on_frontpage.title: Show Takeanimation On Frontpage

show_takevideo_on_frontpage.description: Show button to capture video on frontpage.
show_takevideo_on_frontpage.title: Show Takevideo On Frontpage

show_gallery_on_frontpage.description: Show button to gallery on frontpage.
show_gallery_on_frontpage.title: Show Gallery On Frontpage

show_admin_on_frontpage.description: Show button to admin center, usually only during setup.
show_admin_on_frontpage.title: Show Admin On Frontpage

show_automatic_slideshow_timeout.description: Timeout (seconds) after which a random order slideshow of all images is started. Set to 0 to disable.
show_automatic_slideshow_timeout.title: Show Automatic Slideshow Timeout

livestream_mirror_effect.description: Flip livestream horizontally to create a mirror effect feeling more natural to users.
livestream_mirror_effect.title: Livestream Mirror Effect

FRONTPAGE_TEXT.default:
Hey!
Let's take some pictures!
📷💕
FRONTPAGE_TEXT.title: Frontpage Text

TAKEPIC_MSG_TIME.description: Offset in seconds, the smile-icon shall be shown.
TAKEPIC_MSG_TIME.title: Takepic Msg Time

TAKEPIC_MSG_TEXT.description: Message to display at the end of the capture countdown.
TAKEPIC_MSG_TEXT.title: Takepic Msg Text

AUTOCLOSE_NEW_ITEM_ARRIVED.description: Timeout in seconds a new item popup closes automatically.
AUTOCLOSE_NEW_ITEM_ARRIVED.title: Autoclose New Item Arrived

GALLERY_EMPTY_MSG.default:
Empty, Zero, Nada! 🤷‍♂️
Let's take some pictures!
📷💕
GALLERY_EMPTY_MSG.description: Message displayed if gallery is empty.
GALLERY_EMPTY_MSG.title: Gallery Empty Msg

gallery_show_qrcode.description: Show QR code in gallery. If shareservice is enabled the URL is automatically generated, if not go to share config and provide URL.
gallery_show_qrcode.title: Gallery Show Qrcode

gallery_filter_userselectable.description: Filter the user may choose from in the gallery. 'original' applies no filter.

items.description: enum to choose image filter from, pilgram filter
items.title: EnumPilgramFilter

gallery_filter_userselectable.title: Pic1 Filter Userselectable

gallery_show_delete.description: Show delete button for items in gallery.
gallery_show_delete.title: Gallery Show Delete

gallery_show_print.description: Show print button for items in gallery.
gallery_show_print.title: Gallery Show Print

allOf.title: Personalize the User Interface

default.FRONTPAGE_TEXT:
Hey!
Let's take some pictures!
📷💕
default.GALLERY_EMPTY_MSG:
Empty, Zero, Nada! 🤷‍♂️
Let's take some pictures!
📷💕

allOf.description:
Choose backends for still images/high quality images captured on main backend.
If the livepreview is enabled, the video is captured from live backend (if configured)
or main backend.
enum to choose image backend MAIN from
allOf.title: EnumImageBackendsMain

MAIN_BACKEND.description: Main backend to use for high quality still captures. Also used for livepreview if backend is capable of.
MAIN_BACKEND.title: Main Backend

allOf.description: enum to choose image backend LIVE from
allOf.title: EnumImageBackendsLive

LIVE_BACKEND.description: Secondary backend used for live streaming only. Useful to stream from webcam if DSLR camera has no livestream capability.
LIVE_BACKEND.title: Live Backend

LIVEPREVIEW_FRAMERATE.description: Reduce the framerate to save cpu/gpu on device displaying the live preview
LIVEPREVIEW_FRAMERATE.title: Livepreview Framerate

retry_capture.description: Number of attempts to gather a picture from backend.
retry_capture.title: Retry Capture

gphoto2_capture_target.description: Set capture target (examples: 'Internal RAM', 'Memory card'). To keep images, capture to a disk target. Empty means default of camera (mostly RAM).
gphoto2_capture_target.title: Gphoto2 Capture Target

gphoto2_disable_viewfinder_before_captur.description: Disable viewfinder before capture might speed up following capture autofocus. Might not work with every camera.
gphoto2_disable_viewfinder_before_captur.title: Gphoto2 Disable Viewfinder Before Capture

gphoto2_iso_liveview.description: Sets the ISO for when the photobooth is in live preview modus. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. Only works when the camera is in manual. (Example Values: Auto, 100, 200, ...)
gphoto2_iso_liveview.title: Gphoto2 Iso Liveview

gphoto2_iso_capture.description: Sets the ISO for when the photobooth captures a photo. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. Only works when the camera is in manual. (Example Values: Auto, 100, 200, ...)
gphoto2_iso_capture.title: Gphoto2 Iso Capture

gphoto2_shutter_speed_liveview.description: Sets the shutter speed for the camera during the photobooth's live preview mode. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. This setting is effective only when the camera is in manual mode. (Example Values: 1, 1/5, 1/20, 1/30, 1/60, 1/1000, 1/4000, ...) Choose a very high default shutter speed in combination with Auto iso to emulate auto exposure.
gphoto2_shutter_speed_liveview.title: Gphoto2 Shutter Speed Liveview

gphoto2_shutter_speed_capture.description: Configures the shutter speed for the camera at the time of capturing a photo in the photobooth. Very useful, when Camera does not support Exposure Simulation, and an external Flash is used. Operational only in manual mode. (Example Values: 1/60, 1/320, 1/1000, 1/2000, 1/4000, ...)
gphoto2_shutter_speed_capture.title: Gphoto2 Shutter Speed Capture

cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: still photo camera resolution width to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Cv2 Cam Resolution Width

cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: still photo camera resolution height to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Cv2 Cam Resolution Height

cv2_device_index.description: Device index of webcam opened in cv2 backend
cv2_device_index.title: Cv2 Device Index

cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.description: Apply horizontal flip to image source to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.title: Cv2 Camera Transform Hflip

cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.description: Apply vertical flip to image source to opencv2 backend
cv2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.title: Cv2 Camera Transform Vflip

v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: still photo camera resolution width on supported backends
v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: V4L Cam Resolution Width

v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: still photo camera resolution height on supported backends
v4l_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: V4L Cam Resolution Height

v4l_device_index.description: Device index of webcam opened in v4l backend
v4l_device_index.title: V4L Device Index

digicamcontrol_base_url.description: Base URL used to connect to the host running the digicamcontrol software. Usually photobooth-app and digicamcontrol are on the same computer and no adjustmend needed.
digicamcontrol_base_url.title: Digicamcontrol Base Url

picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: camera resolution width to capture high resolution photo
picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Picamera2 Capture Cam Resolution Width

picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: camera resolution height to capture high resolution photo
picamera2_CAPTURE_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Picamera2 Capture Cam Resolution Height

picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: camera resolution width to capture live video
picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Picamera2 Preview Cam Resolution Width

picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: camera resolution height to capture live video
picamera2_PREVIEW_CAM_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Picamera2 Preview Cam Resolution Height

picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.description: actual resolution width for liveview stream
picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_WIDTH.title: Picamera2 Liveview Resolution Width

picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.description: actual resolution height for liveview stream
picamera2_LIVEVIEW_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT.title: Picamera2 Liveview Resolution Height

picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.description: Apply horizontal flip to image source to picamera2 backend
picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_HFLIP.title: Picamera2 Camera Transform Hflip

picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.description: Apply vertical flip to image source to picamera2 backend
picamera2_CAMERA_TRANSFORM_VFLIP.title: Picamera2 Camera Transform Vflip

picamera2_AE_EXPOSURE_MODE.description: Usually 0=normal exposure, 1=short, 2=long, 3=custom. Not all necessarily supported by camera!
picamera2_AE_EXPOSURE_MODE.title: Picamera2 Ae Exposure Mode

allOf.description:
Enum type to describe the quality wanted from an encoder.
This may be passed if a specific value (such as bitrate) has not been set.
allOf.title: EnumPicamStreamQuality

picamera2_stream_quality.description: Lower quality results in less data to be transferred and may reduce load on display device.
picamera2_stream_quality.title: Picamera2 Stream Quality (for livepreview)

allOf.title: Camera Backend Config

allOf.description: Configure hardware GPIO, keyboard and more. Find integration information in the documentation.

keyboard_input_keycode_takepic.description: Keycode triggers capture of one image
keyboard_input_keycode_takepic.title: Keyboard Input Keycode Takepic

keyboard_input_keycode_takevideo.description: Keycode triggers start and stop of video (MP4)
keyboard_input_keycode_takevideo.title: Keyboard Input Keycode Takevideo

keyboard_input_keycode_print_recent_item.description: Keycode triggers printing most recent image captured
keyboard_input_keycode_print_recent_item.title: Keyboard Input Keycode Print Recent Item

wled_enabled.description: Enable WLED integration for user feedback during countdown and capture by LEDs.
wled_enabled.title: Wled Enabled

wled_serial_port.description: Serial port the WLED device is connected to.
wled_serial_port.title: Wled Serial Port

gpio_pin_shutdown.description: GPIO pin to shutdown after holding it for 2 seconds.
gpio_pin_shutdown.title: Gpio Pin Shutdown

gpio_pin_reboot.description: GPIO pin to reboot after holding it for 2 seconds.
gpio_pin_reboot.title: Gpio Pin Reboot

gpio_pin_take1pic.description: GPIO pin to take one picture.
gpio_pin_take1pic.title: Gpio Pin Take1Pic

gpio_pin_collage.description: GPIO pin to take a collage.
gpio_pin_collage.title: Gpio Pin Collage

gpio_pin_animation.description: GPIO pin to take an animation (GIF).
gpio_pin_animation.title: Gpio Pin Animation

gpio_pin_video.description: GPIO pin to start recording / stop recording a video (MP4).
gpio_pin_video.title: Gpio Pin Video

gpio_pin_print_recent_item.description: GPIO pin to print last captured item.
gpio_pin_print_recent_item.title: Gpio Pin Print Recent Item

printing_command.description: Command issued to print. Use {filename} as placeholder for the JPEG image to be printed.
printing_command.title: Printing Command

printing_blocked_time.description: Block queue print until time is passed. Time in seconds.
printing_blocked_time.title: Printing Blocked Time

allOf.title: Hardware Input/Output Config

allOf.description: Quite advanced or experimental, usually not necessary to touch. Can change any time.

video_duration.description: Duration of a video in seconds. The user can stop recording earlier but cannot take longer videos.
video_duration.title: Video Duration

title: AppConfig
